price: "Por certo, sobre Meus servos não tens poder algum." E basta teu Senhor por Patrono.
arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِي لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٞۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna ʿibādī laysa laka ʿalayhim sul'ṭānun wakafā birabbika wakīlan
